content: about the pattern this is a knitting pattern of a pig named magic_ring schnitzel it includes a material list abbreviations instructions and photos language this pattern is written in english and russian skill level advanced beginner this pattern includes a material list abbreviations instructions and photos materials required sport weight yarn in pink white and blue approx 10 g each 2 5 circular knitting needles 2 5 mm two double pointed needles 3 mm crochet hook darning needle stuffing stitch markers 10 pins 4 safety pins or scrap yarn scrap yarn in red and black depending on your yarn and needle size the toy may be larger or smaller toy size approximately 18 cm you may sell the finished toy provided you give the credit to svitlana kondratova as the designer you may not sell or share the pattern please don t forget to tag your creations on instagram with @im_strickfieber #im_strickfieber #mrschnitzelthepig if you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me
